page.title: 13TEDDER JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Tedder Junior School was built on the old runway of the previous airfield, a Battle of Britain station.It serves a catchment area of mostly council and some private houses.Our school was opened in October 1974.It has a sunken hall and is one storey.We have a library,reading room and music room.We start school at 8.55am.We have 2 play grounds 1 big and 1 small.We have a lot of P.E. equipment including a climbing frame,football pitch and a netball pitch.All chairs are plastic and metal.We have a pantomime annually and 4 Christmas parties.Most classes go on a day trip once a year.Some 4th years go to an out-door centre for a weeks walking.Our school has a work force of 28 and 250 children.Our topics are History,English,Maths,and Geography,Science,Art,Music and Needlework.
